title: Fireblocks Security Whitepaper (2)_pg18.pdf

pageContent:
The Fireblocks multi-layer 
security solution
The Fireblocks R&D team created a multi-layer security matrix that layers MPC, 
Intel SGX, our signature Policy Engine, and a deposit address authentication 
network to build the most impenetrable system on the market. This ensures that 
our customers’ assets are protected from cyberattacks, internal colluders, and 
human errors.
Fireblocks’ Multi-layer Philosophy for Securing Digital Assets 19
